ctx: intros a la ls H0 H1.
tactic: intros l a0 n m H2 H3 [H4 | H4].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros a la ls H0 H1. unfold pl_tl_length_prod_def_0. intros l a0 n m H2 H3 [H4 | H4]. * split. + intros H5. apply pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 with (l := l) (a := a) (n := n) (m := m) in H5; auto. + intros H5. split. ++ apply pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0 := la) (pl1 := ls); auto. ++ intros H6. apply pl_product_0_4; auto. * subst. apply pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 with (pl0 := la) (pl1 := ls); auto.
